room_title: Escape room "Escape from London" by Can You Escape? in Tampa
review: It was awesome. Had never done an escape room before. Wasn't let down. Will definitely be back to try out the other scenarios. Just a great, fun time.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from London" by Can You Escape? in Tampa
review: This was SO much fun! My husband and I joined another group and all I have to say is thank goodness those teenagers and their dad were with us! Smart cookies! The room was filled with excitement and curiosity while playing the game. The staff were very friendly and made it a great time after we were finished and escaped!! Celebrations all around!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from London" by Can You Escape? in Tampa
review: Great fun for family, friends or a bonding company outing. The clues are sensible and not overly complicated. I would highly recommend this location over others.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from London" by Can You Escape? in Tampa
review: I went for the first time last night and it was awesome! I highly recommend this place if you are looking for something new to try. Make sure you check out the Medieval room!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from London" by Can You Escape? in Tampa
review: What a great experience! We brought our oldest kids for a family bonding day. It was so much fun to see the dynamic and just to watch everyone working together for a common goal. We are excited for the new rooms:).

room_title: Escape room "Escape from London" by Can You Escape? in Tampa
review: Had a great time with my group of friends. The place looks a little sketchy from the parking lot but it's fine. Would definitely recommend.
